name: Pikwip
description:
Make your way to the summit. Will you go it alone, or with a friend? Play co-op on the same screen, or take on the challenge of playing both characters yourself.

Pikwip is the third game created by Shannon Jahnel Lanktree and Sam Bunny. It was made in 72 hours as part of Mini Jam: Summit. The theme for the jam was 'Summit', while the limitation was ‘You can only use WASD and the Arrow keys'.

Pikwip is currently a prototype that may be expanded out into a full game in the future, so feedback and suggestions are welcome.

Shannon Jahnel Lanktree
